column5: hi guys i need to know where there is any open water to get my boat out to fish some crappie and when does rice lake usually clear up by need help guys thx  :)
I thought rice was closed this time of year someone here will know
In a Niagara Bar you can only troll for trouble !
How far South do you want to go?
hi i would like to go about 2 hours south
Check the regulations on Ministry of Natural Resources site.  Rice Lake is CLOSED right now.  First available date .... Last Saturday of April ....
Lake Ontario is WIDE OPEN!  Tony
Go to a Niagara bar... troll for cats (cougars).  Possibility of a double header depending on the size of your worm...
...but make sure you practice catch n release; recommend rubber worms too...
Hey Albert! That new boat in the garage is just killing you huh!!!! LOL! Soon my friend, soon!!! Play some hockey in the meantime to reduce the stress!!!  Fisherpete
